DESCRIPTIONS: Wehenever you apply Marked also apply #b

DarkestMod:AntiqPower.NAME: Antiquarian
DESCRIPTIONS: At the end of each turn add 1 Antique to your discard pile.

DarkestMod:AbomPower.NAME: Abomination
DESCRIPTIONS: Even Turns gain 2 Temporary Strength. NL Odd Turns gain 2 Temporary Dexterity.

DarkestMod:BountyPower.NAME: Bounty Hunter
DESCRIPTIONS: At the start of each turn apply Marked to a random enemy.

DarkestMod:CrusaderPower.NAME: Crusader
DESCRIPTIONS: Every time you play and Attack, gain 3 Block.

DarkestMod:FlagPower.NAME: Flagellant
DESCRIPTIONS: Gain #b
temporary Strength when below 50% HP.

DarkestMod:GrobberPower.NAME: Grave Robber
DESCRIPTIONS: At the start of turn add a Thrown Dagger to the hand

DarkestMod:HellionPower.NAME: Hellion
DESCRIPTIONS: Whenever you gain Strength add random Attack cards to your hand, they cost 0

DarkestMod:HighwayPower.NAME: Highwayman
DESCRIPTIONS: At the start of turn add a Grapeshot to the hand.

DarkestMod:LeperPower.NAME: Leper
DESCRIPTIONS: Each turn gain #b
Strength if you have a Debuff.

DarkestMod:JesterPower.NAME: Jester
DESCRIPTIONS: All incoming stress is reduced by 1.

DarkestMod:ManPower.NAME: Man At Arms
DESCRIPTIONS: Damage from attacks is halved
for the next #b turns.

DarkestMod:VestalPower.NAME: Vestal
DESCRIPTIONS: All cards in the deck are upgraded.

DarkestMod:Riposte.NAME: Riposte
DESCRIPTIONS: Riposte, whenever attacked deal damage back.

DarkestMod:OpenVein.NAME: Open Vein
DESCRIPTIONS: All attacks do an additional !M! darkestmod:Bleed .

DarkestMod:PlagueDoctor.NAME: Plague Doctor
DESCRIPTIONS: At the start of your turn, apply !M! darkestmod:Blight to ALL enemies.

DarkestMod:PowerAffliction.NAME: Afflicted
DESCRIPTIONS: No chance for egress - will this be a massacre?

DarkestMod:HeartAttack.NAME: Deaths Door
DESCRIPTIONS: Stress Causes an Heart Attack and fall to 1 health

DarkestMod:PowerBleed.NAME: Bleed
DESCRIPTIONS: At the Start of your turn, lose #b
HP NL Bleed is reduced by 1 each turn.

DarkestMod:PowerBlight.NAME: Blight
DESCRIPTIONS: [#a0c704]Blighted targets lose #b
HP when triggered.

DarkestMod:PowerMarked.NAME: Marked
DESCRIPTIONS: [#550a8a]Marked Enemies take double damage from the next attack.

DarkestMod:PowerStress.NAME: Stress
DESCRIPTIONS: Current stress level is #b
NL Become Afflcited at 100 Stress
NL Suffer a Heart attack at 200 Stress.

DarkestMod:StunnedPower.NAME: Stunned
DESCRIPTIONS: If the enemy intends to attack Stun them NL Stunned enemies skip their action.

DarkestMod:Tracking.NAME: Tracking
DESCRIPTIONS: Whenever you play an Attack card this turn, the targeted enemy loses HP.

DarkestMod:PowerLight.NAME: Torch Light
DESCRIPTIONS: Current Light level is #b
NL At + 7 gain + 1 Dexterity
NL At -7  gain +1 Strength & +1 Vulnerable per turn.
